short_description: chiavari chair is a party rentals company based in hialeah, florida, united states.
long_description: we will provide the best quality product and customer service in the universe. what makes us different. having honed our expertise in the manufacturing and distribution of chiavari chairs, we have strategically evolved into a comprehensive event equipment provider. to date, chivari has successfully distributed over 2,500,000 items to discerning clients in 47 countries across the world. in north america, our esteemed clientele spans all 50 united states and encompasses seven of the 13 canadian provinces. at chivari, we not only provide exceptional products but also strive to be a reliable partner in creating memorable and successful events. our dedication to quality, innovation, and customer service positions us as a leading force in the event equipment industry. our bilingual sales team, fluent in both english and spanish, comprises hardworking and experienced professionals dedicated to ensuring your optimal experience. for all your event equipment needs, contact us today or call (800) 404-4847.

generated_description: the chiavari chair company, legally known as the chiavari chair company, is a global leader in event furniture supplies. the company specializes in providing high-quality chairs and folding tables for party rentals, resorts, country clubs, and banquet halls. their product range includes various types of chiavari chairs such as resin, steel skeleton, aluminum, and wood chairs, as well as folding chairs, cross-back chairs, and specialty banquet tables. they also offer a variety of accessories including cushions, barstools, and protective covers. the chiavari chair company serves customers across all 50 states and 50 countries, ensuring competitive pricing, high-quality products, and excellent customer service.
